dialogue.htmlContent: The wide, red-carpeted staircase behind you leads down to the ground floor of Zaranix's house. To either side of you, a corridor leads off into other parts of the building, and you wonder which way you should go...

The door to Zaranix's room is slightly ajar, and from within, you can hear the bubbling of potions and clink of glass vials as the master of the house carries out his experiments. There's nothing stopping you from knocking on the door and stepping inside, but, if you didn't want to speak to Zaranix right now, you could always step back and return another time.

You decide to take your leave, and, smiling at Zaranix, you step back. [pc.speech(I'd better get going now. It was good talking to you again, Zaranix.)]

[zaranix.speech(Likewise,)] the imposing incubus states, grinning back at you. [zaranix.speech(Do please visit again! Oh, and if you could, put in a good word with Lilaya about me, hmm?)]

[pc.speech(I will,)] you say, heading towards the door. [pc.speech(Bye!)]

[zaranix.speech(Goodbye! Oh, and don't let Amber be too harsh on you, ok?)] Zaranix waves, before turning his back on you and returning to his experiments.

Numerous bookcases and shelves line the walls to either side of you, and within the main body of the room itself, a number of long tables are being used to hold piles of books, racks of glass bottles, and boxes full of all sorts of raw alchemical ingredients. As you enter, you find yourself thinking that this room looks very much like a small-scale version of Lilaya's laboratory.

There, in the middle of the room, holding a beaker filled with a strange, bubbling green liquid, is the purple-skinned figure of the incubus Zaranix. As he sees that it's you, he places the beaker down on the table beside him and grins. [zaranix.speech(Well, well, well! Look who it is!)]

[pc.speech(Hello again, Zaranix. Amber told me that you'd instructed her to let me in. There's no hard feelings between us then?)] you ask, looking around for any sign of a trap.

[zaranix.speech(Not at all!)] Zaranix booms, before stepping forwards, grabbing your [pc.hand], and giving it a firm shake. [zaranix.speech(I couldn't harbour any ill will towards one of Lilaya's relatives!)]

[pc.speech(Well, that's good to hear,)] you say, smiling at the friendly incubus as he finally releases your [pc.hand].

[zaranix.speech(So, what can old Zaranix do for you this time, [pc.name]?)]

It didn't take me long to find success. After all, it's only us demons who are really able to harness the arcane well enough to make such potions.)] Zaranix smiles as he remembers the events in his past. The house that I was renting at that time soon fell into a appalling state of affairs, and I realised that I was going to need to hire a maid. Little did I know that I was going to end up with my little inferno!)]

You grin as you hear Zaranix's affectionate name for Amber. [pc.speech(So you hired Amber before the sisters?)]

The very instant that I met her, she started scolding me, insulting me, and forcing me to help her clean the house!)]

[pc.speech(That sounds like her,)] you say, smiling as you imagine that first day's interaction between Amber and Zaranix.

[zaranix.speech(After that, however, things started to get better. Kelly and Katherine were her choices, not mine,)] Zaranix says, smiling. [zaranix.speech(Apparently, they've only ever worked as a pair, and had caused quite a bit of trouble in their previous posts.
